content: Make your way to the edge of the lava lake in Rakshasa Palace and turn left to find a large temple carved into the cliff face. The Awaken Wine Worm is inside the temple along the back wall.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Awaken_Wine_Worm_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Awaken Wine Worm Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Rakshasa Palace Awaken Wine Worm'.
The content is as follows:
Make your way to the edge of the lava lake in Rakshasa Palace and turn left to find a large temple carved into the cliff face. The Awaken Wine Worm is inside the temple along the back wall.
